label: HandleInjury
messages: Does your mom know you talk like this? :angry:
Hey, my friend! :v: Remember what Afrika Bambaata said: peace, unity, love and having fun!

m: This time I will let it slide.

label: HandleNone
messages: Ok... :thinking: sorry, I'm not sure I got what you mean.
42! Oops... that wasn't your question, was it?
Sorry... can you repeat slowly, please?
Be fair with me, I'd only been trained to talk about Flavio.

label: NoProject
m: Those weird names, ha? I understand you.

label: HandleHobby
m: Thanks for asking! I mainly love music, sports, good meals, red ale beers.
And travel, of course. I've been in so many places in Europe and South America.
Lots of wonderful people. I'm deeply grateful for that.

label: HandleLove
m: This is very sweet of you :blush:
I'm just a bot trying to do my best.
Looking forward to have you here again soon...
